content.rendered: Gentle and fragrance free, this Sensitive Sunscreen Lotion SPF 50+ is the best sunscreen for sensitive skin. Formulated to protect the most delicate skin. Broad spectrum, non-greasy and up to 4 hours water resistant to give you maximum coverage. Suitable for anyone with sensitive skin, expecting mums, children and babies over 6 months old. It’s lightweight with a sheer finish and doubles as the perfect primer under makeup. If your skin is easily irritated, then this Sensitive Sunscreen is for you!

excerpt.rendered:
Nothing makes us smile more than the warmth of the sun on our skin. Formulated with the softest of skins in mind.

  • Dermatologically tested and clinically proven SPF 50+ for sensitive skin.
  • Free from fragrance, PABAs, parabens, oxybenzone and octinoxate.
  • Australian owned and made.
